explains: n. 动物群；[动]动物区系
wordGroup: flora and fauna 动植物；动植物群

sentences.en: This resulted in the "biome," a combination of coexisting flora and fauna.
sentences.cn: 这就产生了生物群系的概念——一种植物群和动物群共存的结合体。

sentences.en: The news is constantly reporting what human endeavours have caused extensive damage to flora and fauna in the planet.
sentences.cn: 新闻正不断报道人类给地球动植物群造成严重破坏的所作所为。

sentences.en: The deep sea typically has a sparse fauna dominated by tiny worms and crustaceans, with an even sparser distribution of larger animals.
sentences.cn: 深海通常有稀疏的动物群，以微小的蠕虫和甲壳类动物为主，更大的动物分布更少。
